resources.string: Project Radiant is a custom ROM utilising the HarmonyOS Sans font. We\'re glad to have you with us. You can change the language or configure accesibility options via the icons above. Here are some points we wish to inform you about:
You can join our Telegram channel @ProjectRadiant for ROM and build update posts alongside screenshots and teasers!
You can report source/ROM bugs in our ROM chat at @ProjectRadiantChat. Make sure to attach logcats!
You can help us with localisation by checking the crowdin link in our chat\'s notes and translating the ROM in your language.
We do not take donations. Most of us are still in school, which is why we need more people. You can help people with issues in our chats or even join us to maintain or develop the ROM.
How would you like to get around?
Start a tutorial for navigation gestures after this screen
